text: Batman, also known as Batman: The Movie, is a spin-off of the 1960s series. The Joker, The Penguin, The Riddler and Catwoman appear in the movie. The movie stars Adam West. Category:Movies based on TV series Category:Movies based on comic book characters Category:Batman movies Category:1966 movies Category:1960s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Leslie H. Martinson
title: Batman (1966 movie)
